short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple(and funky) reminder to fix your posture when you are on that grindset.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: No more curling up like a cocktail shrimp over your desk.Get this extension to periodically get reminded to fix your posture.Your back will be saying "shell yeah!" in no time.
